precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The right-click context menu is open on the Windows XP desktop.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab will become active, displaying options related to the screen saver.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the down arrow on the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of available screensavers.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu in the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click on any empty space within the open "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the button labeled 'Power...' at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected.
action: Click on the dropdown arrow of the "Power schemes" list.
expected_results: A dropdown list will appear, displaying options like "Home/Office Desk", "Portable/Laptop", "Presentation", "Always On", "Minimal Power Management", and "Max Battery".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "Always On" item in the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Power schemes" dropdown menu will close. The "Settings for Always On power scheme" section will now display "After 20 mins" for "Turn off hard disks", "Never" for "Turn off monitor", "Never" for "System standby", and "Never" for "System hibernates".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Always On" power scheme is selected in the dropdown menu.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to the "Turn off hard disks" option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time intervals ranging from "After 1 min" to "Never".

precondition: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu within the "Power Options Properties" window is open.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will close and "Never" will be selected.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Always On" power scheme is selected and the "Apply" button is active.
expected_results: The settings will be temporarily applied and a confirmation dialog may appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active.
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the "Power Options Properties" window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close, and the "Display Properties" window will become active.
